subject: Eclipse 2.1 JUnit enhancements
msgSnippet: Cool new stuff: - can now select an option to run all tests in an Project, source folder, or Java package! - new JUnit action Navigate  Go To  Referring

Cool new stuff:
- can now select an option to run all tests in an Project, source folder, or
Java package!

- "new JUnit action Navigate > Go To > Referring Tests finds and navigates
to tests that reference a particular type or method."

- can easily select individual test methods to run/re-run

http://download.eclipse.org/downloads/drops/R-2.1-200303272130/whats-new-jdt
-junit.html

Scott Stirling
